object_type.label: Object Type
object_type.description: (array) (Required) Array of object types with which the field group should be associated.

description.label: Description
description.description: (string) A short descriptive summary of what the field group is for.

location.label: Location
location.description:
(array) An array containing 'rule groups' where each 'rule group' is an array containing 'rules'. 
			Each group is considered an 'or', and each rule is considered an 'and'.

menu_order.label: Menu Order
menu_order.description: (int) Field groups are shown in order from lowest to highest. Defaults to 0

position.label: Position
position.description: (string) Determines the position on the edit screen. Defaults to normal. Choices of 'acf_after_title', 'normal' or 'side'

style.label: Style
style.description: (string) Determines the metabox style. Defaults to 'default'. Choices of 'default' or 'seamless'

label_placement.label: Label Placement
label_placement.description:
(string) Determines where field labels are places in relation to fields. Defaults to 'top'. 
			Choices of 'top' (Above fields) or 'left' (Beside fields)

hide_on_screen.label: Hide on Screen
hide_on_screen.description: (array) An array of elements to hide on the screen
